div.a: School to remain closed for the remaining school year.

div.div: School will remain closed for the remainder of the school year. Online and remote learning will continue until May 29, 2020.Read more...
Per Governor Greg Abbott, schools will remain closed and continue remote learning through May 4, 2020.Read more...
